钳字的基本解释

钳
（鉗）
qián
夹住，限制，约束：钳制（用强力限制，使不能自由行动）。钳击。
夹东西的用具：钳子。老虎钳。平口钳。钳工。

钳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qián］
［《廣韻》巨淹切，平鹽，羣。］
“钳1”的繁体字。
(1)古刑具。束颈的铁圈。
(2)古刑罚。以铁器钳束人的颈项、手、足。
(3)钳持，缄禁。
(4)引申为威慑。
(5)恶劣。
(6)夹，夹取。
(7)用来夹持小型工件，弯曲或切断金属丝的一种工具。可分为尖口钳、平口钳和鲤鱼钳等。
(8)节肢动物的螯。

钳字的英文翻译

◎ 钳
clamp, grip, nip, pincers, pliers, restrain, tongs

钳字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鉗； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1328第06
【唐韻】巨淹切【集韻】【韻會】其淹切，?音箝。【說文】以鐵有所刼束也。从金甘聲。【前漢·高帝紀】自髠鉗爲王家奴。【註】鉗，以鐵束頸也。【後漢·光武紀】弛解鉗衣。【註】倉頡篇曰：鉗，釱也。釱足鉗。又【五行志】廣漢鉗子謀攻牢。【師古註】鉗子，謂鉗徒也。【晉律】鉗重二斤，翹長一尺五寸。【集韻】或作鉆。　又銸也。【後漢·梁冀傳】妻孫壽，性鉗忌。【註】鉗，取也。言性忌害如鉗之能銸物也。　又【揚子·方言】惡也。南楚，凡人殘罵謂之鉗。　又【家語】無取鉗鉗。【註】鉗鉗，妄行不誠也。　又【呂氏春秋】後時者，小莖而麻長，短穗而厚糠小米，鉗而不香。　又澤名。【張衡·南都賦】其陂澤則有鉗盧玉池。　又姓。【正字通】唐元和中長令鉗耳。　又與拑通。【後漢·袁紹傳】道路以目，百辟鉗口。【註】以木銜其口也。或作拑。渠廉反。　又【集韻】其嚴切，音黔。義同。　又【集韻】五甘切，音玵。刃也。

考證：〔又鋷也。【後漢·梁冀傳】妻孫壽，性鉗忌。【註】鉗
钳字的源字形

钳字的起名意思

夹东西的工具。也指用工具夹住。

clamp
Basic explanation of words
clamp
(clamp)
qián
Clamping, restraining, restraining: restraining (restricting with force to prevent free movement). Squeeze.
Tools for holding things: pliers. Vise. Flat-nose pliers. fitter.
clamp
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qián］
["Guangyun" giant flooded cut, flat salt, group. ]
Traditional characters for "Clamp 1".
(1) Ancient instruments of torture. The iron ring to tie the neck.
(2) Ancient penalty. Use iron tongs to tie a person's neck, hands, and feet.
(3) Clamp and restrain.
(4) The extension is deterrence.
(5) Bad.
(6) Clamp, clamp and take.
(7) A tool used to clamp small workpieces and bend or cut metal wires. It can be divided into sharp-nose pliers, flat-nose pliers and slip joint pliers.
(8) Arthropod claws.
clamp

clamp, grip, nip, pincers, pliers, restrain, tongs

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　pliers; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1328 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Juyan cut [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Its drown cut, sound pliers. [Said the text] There is also a sash with iron. From the sound of Jin Gan. [Pre-Han · Gao Di Ji] Since the tongs were Wang's slaves. [Note] Pliers, tie the neck with iron. [Later Han·Guangwu Ji] To relax the tongs. [Note] The Cangjie chapter says: Clamp, Jie Ye. Foot pliers. Also【Five Elements】Guanghan Pliers seek to attack. [Shigu Note] Pliers are also called pliers. [Jin law] The pliers weigh two catties and are one foot and five inches long. [Ji Yun] Or as a drill.　Yeah again. [Later Han·Liang Ji Biography] Wife Sun Shou, sex clamp. [Note] Clamp, take it. Words avoid harm like pliers.　[Yangtze Dialect] Also evil. Nanchu, mortal abuse is called the forceps.　[Family language] No tongs. [Note] Clamping forceps is also impertinent.　[Lu Shi Chunqiu] Later, small stems and long hemp, short ears and thick bran millet, tongs but not fragrant.　Also known as Ze. 【Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu】Qi Pize has clamp Lu Yuchi.　Another last name. [Zhengzitong] Tang Yuanhe Zhongchang Lingqiang ears.　Connect with Clamp again. [The Story of Yuan Shao in the Later Han Dynasty] The road is in sight, and every jaw is opened. [Note] The mouth is also held by wood. Or make pliers. Qu Lian opposed.　[Jiyun] It’s strict and sound. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Five Gan cuts, sound 玵. Blade also. Textual research: 〔Yes again. [Later Han·Liang Ji Biography] Wife Sun Shou, sex clamp. 【Note】Pliers

Зная слово.
От Цзинь (нянь) это означает, что щипцы сделаны из металла; от Ган «甘» означает «пища во рту», ​​что означает, что щипцы являются инструментами для удерживания предметов.
Плоскогубцы упрощены до плоскогубцев.
①Металлические инструменты, используемые для зажима или разрушения вещей: ~ 子 | 火 ~ | 虎 ~.
